titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for the permanent extension of qualified small issue bonds and to except certain expenditures from the limitation of such bonds.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1241-1242)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/12/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permanently authorize the issuance of qualified small issue bonds issued to finance manufacturing facilities and farm property. Excepts certain expenditures from the monetary limitation on such bonds.
